data.Title: Google March 2024 Core Update: Insights & Takeaways
data.Description: Google's March 2024 core update was a significant event, addressing spam, improving search quality, and impacting rankings. The rollout took 45 days and aimed to reduce unhelpful content by 45%.

data.Title: Google Search Leak Sparks Debate & Discussion
data.Description: A leaked Google document has ignited discussions about the search engine's ranking factors and SEO practices. The document's contents have raised questions about Google's transparency and the effectiveness of certain SEO strategies.

data.Title: Google Search Updates: UI Changes, New Features & Tests
data.Description: Google is constantly testing and refining its search results pages. Recent updates include experiments with shaded gray colors behind site names in mobile snippets, QR codes on Google Maps Business Profiles, and the removal of home activity cards.

data.Title: Microsoft Bing Undergoes Changes, Impacting Perion Network
data.Description: Microsoft is making changes to its Bing search engine, including ad pricing adjustments and the removal of certain publishers from its distribution marketplace. These changes have significantly impacted Perion Network, a digital advertising company heavily reliant on Bing.
